name: Thylla and The Old Gods
description:
Thylla and the Old Gods is a Lovecraftian horror/puzzle adventure. Our protagonist Thylla has been swept up from the beaches of their home and placed in the sick playhouse of Ghat, one of many children of the Great Old One themself, Cthulhu.

This project was developed by the members of the ISU Game Development Club Challenge Team in the Fall of 2021. For more information on how to get involved with the club, reference the contact information on the following page: https://redbirdlife.illinoisstate.edu/organization/gdc
